mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leave_request ( leave_request_id, leave_request_type, leave_request_start, leave_request_end, leave_request_reason, member_id ) VALUES ( leave_request_seq.NEXTVAL,#{leaveRequestType},#{leaveRequestStart},#{leaveRequestEnd},#{leaveRequestReason},#{memberId} )
mapper.select: SELECT M.member_name, M.position, D.department_name,M.leave_Count, L.leave_request_start, L.leave_request_end, L.leave_request_status, L.leave_Request_Reason FROM LEAVE_REQUEST L INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON L.member_id = M.member_id INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.department_id = D.department_id
